title: Goodyear microfibre Window Cloth I Designed Microfiber Cloth for windscreens, windows and mirrors| Statically charged cleaning| Leaves lint free finish| Ideal for effective cleaning of glass surfaces
features: Quick and Effective Cleaning: The Goodyear Microfibre Window Cloth is specially engineered to provide fast and efficient cleaning for all your glass surfaces. Whether you're tackling stubborn dirt on your car's windshield or polishing your home's windows, this cloth delivers impressive results with minimal effort.

Superior Microfibre Technology: Made from high-quality microfibre material, this cloth features statically charged cleaning fibres that attract and capture dust, dirt, and grime. The ultra-soft and non-abrasive texture ensures gentle cleaning without scratching or damaging your glass surfaces.

Durable and Long-Lasting: Built to last, the Goodyear Microfibre Window Cloth can be used repeatedly without losing its effectiveness. Simply wash and reuse it, making it an eco-friendly and cost-effective cleaning solution. Keep your glass surfaces spotless and shining with the Goodyear Microfibre Window Cloth Large.

Lint-Free Finish: Say goodbye to annoying lint and streaks. The Goodyear Microfibre Window Cloth leaves a flawless, lint-free finish every time. Perfect for achieving crystal-clear visibility on your car's windscreen or a sparkling shine on your bathroom mirrors.

Easy to Handle: The large size of the cloth provides ample coverage, allowing you to clean larger surfaces quickly and efficiently. Its lightweight and easy-to-handle design make cleaning tasks a breeze. Trusted Brand: Goodyear is a name you can trust for quality and reliability.
description: Experience the ultimate in glass cleaning with the GOODYEAR Microfibre Window Cloth Large. Specially designed to provide quick and effective cleaning for both interior and exterior glass surfaces, this high-quality microfibre cloth ensures that your windscreens, windows, and mirrors are left spotless and streak-free. It has premium microfibre material, known for its exceptional ability to attract and trap dust, dirt, and grime. The statically charged cleaning fibres work like a magnet, pulling particles away from the surface and into the cloth, ensuring a thorough clean with minimal effort. Whether you're tackling tough smudges on your car's windshield or giving your home's windows a crystal-clear shine, this microfibre cloth is up to the task. Its large size provides ample coverage, allowing you to clean larger areas more efficiently, while its soft texture is gentle on surfaces, preventing scratches and damage. One of the standout features of the GOODYEAR Microfibre Window Cloth is its ability to leave surfaces completely lint-free. Unlike traditional cleaning cloths that can leave behind annoying lint and streaks, this microfibre cloth ensures a pristine finish every time, enhancing visibility and appearance. GOODYEAR Microfibre Window Cloth is simple and convenient. Use it dry to dust and polish, or dampen it with water for a deeper clean. There's no need for harsh chemicals, making it a safe option for both you and the environment.
